0xa84918f3280d488eb3369cb713ec53ce386b6c.name: The Treasury
0xa84918f3280d488eb3369cb713ec53ce386b6c.description: DAO Controlled TCR governance rights that will be distributed in whichever way the governors choose to do so, by proposal to the DAO.

0x90d93f5a390bfdbc401f92e916197ee17470a4.name: Lion's Mane Vesting
0x90d93f5a390bfdbc401f92e916197ee17470a4.description: These governance tokens will be distributed to Lion’s Mane over a three year period. See the details of this proposal here.

0xa6a006c12338cdcdbc882c6ab97e4f9f823406.name: Lion's Mane
0xa6a006c12338cdcdbc882c6ab97e4f9f823406.description: A pride of hackers, crypto-economists and open-source ideologues that have pledged their software development services to the Tracer DAO.

0x2b79e11984514ece5b2db561f49c0466cc7659.name: The 100’s Vesting
0x2b79e11984514ece5b2db561f49c0466cc7659.description: The initial 100 claimants that claimed from the DAO contract’s governance tokens which will be vested over a three year period.

unknown.name: Loyal Governers
unknown.description: All other TCR DAO members. Each and every one of you is highly valued. Thanks for maintaining such a great project.
